actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

actions.subcommittee: the Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties

official_title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to limit the number of consecutive terms that a Member of Congress may serve.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Prohibits a person from serving more than two full consecutive terms as a Senator or six full consecutive terms as a Representative.

titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to limit the number of consecutive terms that a Member of Congress may serve.
